title: Stardew Valley
about: You’ve inherited your grandfather’s old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

keyFeatures.title: Farm to Table
keyFeatures.description: Grow seasonal crops, raise happy animals, and craft useful items.

keyFeatures.title: Community Life
keyFeatures.description: Befriend the 30+ residents of Pelican Town, start a family, or find love.

keyFeatures.title: Exploration and Mining
keyFeatures.description: Venture deep into mysterious caves to battle monsters and find treasures.

details.platforms: PC, Mac, Linux, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, Mobile
